metadata.title: CVE-2014-3963 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
ownCloud Server before 6.0.1 does not properly check permissions, whichallows remote authenticated users to access arbitrary preview pictures viaunspecified vectors.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3963` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

owncloud - 6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: owncloud package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.0.1+dfsg-1ubuntu1').
